## Research

Who I am: *Theoretical computer science, applicable mathematics.*\
What I do: *Quantum computing.*

[Theoretical computer science and mathematics are about proving theorems, which is what I (try to) do most of the
time. To assess the practical utility of results that I obtain on paper, I also often write proof-of-concept source
code. Apart from pure theory, I\'m fond of compiler engineering: the closer to the metal the better. With my
research, I aim to contribute to realizing quantum computing within this decade.]{.small}
